fields.description:
as a deputy i want to know what is expected of me when i open a report so that I can complete the report accurately 

|1| when user creates report and clicks save they land on the overview section of the report | |
|2| for a user with one report for one client when they login to the service they will land on this screen | |
|3| meets definition of done | |

Does not include content at this stage

fields.description:
as a deputy I want to be able to define the start and end of my report period so that I can record my activity against between those dates

|1| user can see add start date, and add end date fields to enter dates | |
|2| date format must be valid | |
|3| start date must be before end date | |
|4| end date cannot be over 1 year from start date | |
|5| message appears when dates are incorrect and cannot save| |
|6| meets definition of done | |

fields.description:
as a deputy I want to be able to add the details of my client, so that the details on the annual report are correct

|1| user can only save when all mandatory fields complete | |
|2| if mandatory fields are not complete see message to say what is needed | |
|3| non mandatory fields not needed to be completed (telephone) | |
|4 |meets definition of done | |

Mandatory fields:
first name- must be at least 2 characters
surname - must be at least 2 characters
address-must be completed
court order date- must be correct format
court order type (Property & Affairs, Personal Welfare, or both order types)

fields.description:
as a lay deputy I want to be able to update my details, so that the details on the annual report are correct

|1| when user has created a password and clicks save they are redirected to the add details page | |
|2| admin user has different mandatory fields to a deputy | |
|3| user can only save when all mandatory fields complete | |
|4| if mandatory fields are not complete see message to say what is needed | 
|5|meets definition of done | |

Deputy details are shown in the design
Admin details should be first name and surname

Mandatory fields are:
first name, surname, address, telephone number
fields.summary: deputy able to add in their details
